name: Heather Black Attachable Hooded Scarf
description:
Clothing for a Cause

SHELTER collaborates with non-profit organizations to promote art education. Through our product, we are a catalyst for educational growth- please help fund art programs for underprivileged children locally and globally.​

​​SHELTER scarves unique design offer many ways for them to be styled; the "attachable hooded scarves" are two separate pieces which allows you to mix and match colors, as well as have the capability to remove the hood completely and just wear as a scarf.

​Manufactured in Los Angeles.

Fall/Winter collection
Tri-Blend Fleece
50%poly 41%cotton 9%rayon
